name: Melted (occultTentacle)
description:
Resource-management game about rescuing survivors of the global cataclysm, after which Earth is covered in water, and getting them to last remaining plot of land.

Collect fuel and food to keep the ship going and collect gears to upgrade it, avoid mines and bring the last remaining humanity to safety.

The game was made using Unity 2019.3.9f1, Blender for models and Photoshop for UI. Made for TwoWeeksGameJam 16.

Feel free to download the game or souce files for learning purposes, although you probably won't learn much, the code is garbage, but maybe it will help you gather some confidence as a beginning developer. Consider donating a few pennies if you found it useful.

Credits:

Toon Water Shader by Roystan

Music by Kevin Macleod

Bomb explosion effect - Simple FX Cartoon Particles by Synty Studios.
